nodes.text: He was stationed in the Tatooinian Imperial capital of Bestine. He was an apparent supporter of Victor Visalis, and his "Stormtrooper surge" policy.

TK-471 appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
